mapper.select: select a.author_id,a.author_name,a.author_gender,a.author_brief, b.book_id,b.book_name,b.book_brief, p.publisher_id,p.publisher_name from author a left join bookauthor ba on ba.author_id=a.author_id left join books b on b.book_id=ba.book_id inner join publisher p on p.publisher_id=b.publisher_id where a.author_name=#{author_name}
